verses.verse: "At that <S%H6256>time<s%> shall <S%H4317>Michael<s%> stand <S%H5975>up,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8269>prince<s%> who <S%H5975>stands<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people;<s%> and there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> such as never was since there was a <S%H1471>nation<s%> even to that same <S%H6256>time:<s%> and at that <S%H6256>time<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H4422>delivered,<s%> everyone who shall be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many<s%> of those who <S%H3463>sleep<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> shall <S%H6974>awake,<s%> some to <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2416>life,<s%> and some to <S%H2781>shame<s%> and <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1860>contempt.<s%>

Those who are <S%H7919>wise<s%> shall <S%H2094>shine<s%> as the <S%H2096>brightness<s%> of the <S%H7549>expanse;<s%> and those who turn <S%H7227>many<s%> to <S%H6663>righteousness<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> <S%H5703>forever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

But <S%H1840>you,<s%> Daniel, shut <S%H5640>up<s%> the <S%H1697>words,<s%> and <S%H2856>seal<s%> the <S%H5612>book,<s%> even to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end:<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> shall run back and <S%H7751>forth,<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> shall be <S%H7235>increased.<s%>"

Then <S%H1840>I,<s%> Daniel, <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H8147>behold,<s%> two <S%H312>others<s%> <S%H5975>stood,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> on the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H8193>bank<s%> on this <S%H2008>side,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> on the <S%H2975>river<s%> bank on that <S%H8193>side.<s%>

One <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> who was <S%H4605>above<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H2975>river,<s%> How long shall it be to the <S%H7093>end<s%> of these <S%H6382>wonders?<s%>

I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> who was <S%H4605>above<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H2975>river,<s%> when he held <S%H7311>up<s%> his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> and his left <S%H8040>hand<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H7650>swore<s%> by him who <S%H2416>lives<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> that it shall be for a <S%H4150>time,<s%> <S%H4150>times,<s%> and a <S%H2677>half;<s%> and when they have <S%H3615>made<s%> an end of breaking in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> all these things shall be <S%H3615>finished.<s%>
I <S%H8085>heard,<s%> but I <S%H995>didn't<s%> understand: then I <S%H559>said,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> what shall be the issue of these <S%H319>things?<s%>
He <S%H559>said,<s%> Go your <S%H3212>way,<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel;<s%> for the <S%H1697>words<s%> are shut <S%H5640>up<s%> and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> until the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many<s%> shall <S%H1305>purify<s%> <S%H3835>themselves,<s%> and make themselves white, and be <S%H6884>refined;<s%> but the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall do <S%H7561>wickedly;<s%> and none of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H995>understand;<s%> but those who are <S%H7919>wise<s%> shall <S%H995>understand.<s%>

From the <S%H6256>time<s%> that the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt offering shall be taken <S%H5493>away,<s%> and the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> that makes <S%H8074>desolate<s%> set <S%H5414>up,<s%> there shall be one <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is he who <S%H2442>waits,<s%> and <S%H5060>comes<s%> to the one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
But go you your <S%H3212>way<s%> until the <S%H7093>end;<s%> for you shall <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> in your <S%H1486>lot,<s%> at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of the <S%H3117>days.<s%>
